name: GwenBlade: Inner Demons
description:
Gwen Blade – psychological action-adventure about a schoolgirl, that searching for herself in fascinating dreams and in a music band.

Her name is Jane Walker she is 16 y.o. Interested in music, in trips in an abandoned building, and quite self-contained. She has not any friends except her best friend Gretta. But each day they keep in touch less and less.

Jane has psychic abilities, that cause her deep scaring nightmares. In Nightmares, she has to run away, until she realizes that she can use her happy memories to slay inner demons. With all happy memory, she creates Treble clef Sword.

The gameplay divided into two parts:
In real life, she needs to contact other people, keep in touch with Gretta and make decisions that will change her life.
In the subconscious, Jane has to confront inner demons of herself or other people that happen to be affected by her powers.

Na all this way Jane go throw with the player.
